name: Baseball-pi
tagline: A dedicated Raspberry PI Baseball scoreboard using LEDs and a 4x20 character display
body:
#Baseball-pi

A Baseball scoreboard designed for the Raspberry Pi 3, a work in progress.  Go Mariners.

##Compiling

Dependencies: curlpp, libxml++-2.6
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
